entry.title: $1750 // ASTORIA EFFICIENCY APARTMENT
entry.content: Sunny and Spacious 2 Bedroom Efficiency Unit in a Townhouse in Long Island City/ Borderline Astoria. Lots of Windows With Natural Lights. Large Bedroom Can Fit a Queens Size Bed. Second Bedroom Can Fit a Full-Size Bed. This Property is Borderline Long Island City and Astoria. You Get the Best Of Both Worlds. Steps Away From New Trendy Restaurants and Natural Food Store in Long Island City. Close Walking Distance To The Remodeled Washington Avenue Train Station (N and W). Or Walk Straight Down Crescent Street to The 7 Train at Queensboro Plaza / Bridge Plaza. EFFICIENCY APARTMENT UNIT. NO COOKING. $1750/ month
